participant_1.background:
Since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I enjoy doing beadwork and writing my own patterns.
I love reading.
I grew up on a large farm.

participant_2.background:
I am not married.
I love basketball.
I like to sing.
I like to hunt.

content.text: I love doing beadwork. I've been doing it for years and I love coming up with new patterns.
That's cool! I love doing crafts too. I love to sing and I've been playing basketball since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I used to love playing basketball when I was younger, but I haven't played in a while.
You should start playing again! It's a great way to stay active and it's really fun.
Yeah, I might have to start playing again. I used to love it.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
No problem! So, what's your favorite type of beadwork?
I like to do all kinds of beadwork, but my favorite is probably beading jewelry.
That's cool! I've never made jewelry before, but I've always wanted to try.
It's not too hard to get started. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! So, what's your favorite book?
My favorite book is probably The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I love the writing style.
Me too! It's so beautiful and lyrical.
Yeah, it really is. So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the basketball game or just hang out at home.
Sounds like fun! I'm going to go to the basketball game with my friends.
That sounds like it'll be a lot of fun. I'm jealous!
It should be! I'm looking forward to it.
